General.Name: Genus Paper & Boards Limited
General.Description: Genus Paper & Boards Limited primarily manufactures and sells kraft paper in India. It operates through two segments, Kraft Paper Business and Strategic Investment Activity. The company offers carton boards, container boards, bag papers, and duplex boards. It also invests in shares and securities, and loans. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: D-116, Okhla Industrial Area, New Delhi, India, 110020
